Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's First Case
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Duke O'Dowd as the Human Meteor and his initial investigation into a suspicious sedan and a clandestine operation involving a yacht and a sunken Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Ride
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic and Duke's taxi driver life, setting the stage for his transformation.

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor to investigate a suspicious sedan and confronts its occupants.

narrative_arcs.title: Suspicious Sedan and the Human Meteor's Emergence

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Yacht Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Police arrive, Human Meteor visits hospital and hears about yacht suspicion, leading to a stowaway plan.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration and Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Toby sneaks onto the yacht, Pete discovers a suspicious chart, leading to Pete falling overboard.

narrative_arcs.title: Pete's Yacht Duty and Suspicious Chart
Duke's Observation and Toby's Confirmed Action

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Investigation and Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives, rescues Pete, discovers sunken submarine and gets attacked by divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Rush and Pete's Rescue
Discovery of the Sunken Japanese Submarine
Inside the Submarine: Torpedo Loading Operation
Surface Attack and Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Surface ship reacts to torpedo, Human Meteor investigates Peter's cabin, revealing Peter's Navy connection and Toby's rescue, concluding with hospital visit and drive home.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Map Discovery in Peter's Cabin
Evening Drive Home and Future Growth
Bedtime and Anticipation of New Adventures

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Garage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new set of characters, the Liberty Lads, and then focuses on two boys, Skip and Chuck, who stumble upon a Nazi spy ring operating out of a bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Introduction and Ambulance Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads fighting Nazis, followed by an ambulance arriving in a suburban neighborhood.

narrative_arcs.title: Ambulance Arrival and Injured Person at the House

sub_scenes.title: The Lost Wallet and Marine Sighting
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet, leading them to the Transcontinental Bus Company garage, and observe a marine saluting a civilian.

sub_scenes.title: Garage Ambush and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Boys approach the garage, get invited inside, and are then ambushed and interrogated by Mr. Horst and his men.

narrative_arcs.title: Approaching the Garage to Return the Wallet
Questioning and Suspicion about the Wallet
Wallet Examination and Discovery of Address

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Betrayal and Boys' Escape
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst orders violence, but Major Bronson intervenes, revealing a carbon monoxide poisoning plan and then betraying Horst to help the boys escape.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Sabotage Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Boys split up, Chuck flees, Skip discovers a secret office and sabotage plans, leading to confrontation with foreign agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Marine Rescue and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Marines are alerted, arrive forcefully, engage in a fight, rescue Major Bronson and the boys, leading to the dismantling of the Nazi spy ring.

narrative_arcs.title: Nazi Rats' Taunt and Marine Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Kidnapped President's Daughter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows The Champ and Henry in South America as they get entangled in the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre, leading to a daring rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Initial Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry and their mission, followed by suspicion from locals in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery in South American Town and Impending Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Armed officers interrogate The Champ and Henry, revealing the kidnapping of President Rosita's daughter by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plot and Mother's Plea
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's plan is revealed, followed by Rosita's mother pleading for help and providing information about El Tigre's hideout.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Car Ride and Arrival at Rosita's Mother's House
Plea for Help and Intelligence from Rosita's Mother

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration and Confrontation with El Tigre
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry infiltrate El Tigre's hideout using a diversion, leading to a face-to-face confrontation with El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Sneaking into El Tigre's Hideout and Planning a Diversion
Money Diversion and El Tigre's Distraction

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation and humiliation of a smaller man, search for Rosita, leading to a rescue mission after finding her location.

narrative_arcs.title: Threat of Force for Rosita's Location

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Rescue and Victory
sub_scenes.description: Rescue mission culminates in Rosita being found and a fight breaking out, leading to her rescue and the defeat of Axis agents.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, focusing on his mission to retrieve sub detector plans and his encounters with native tribes and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Mission Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in a jungle brawl and reports a grave matter to Captain Lawton, revealing his mission context.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Brawl with Devil Dog Dolan
Reporting a Grave Matter to Captain Lawton

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: The Leatherneck infiltrates the jungle, facing a hidden native threat and then an overwhelming ambush.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival, Jungle Infiltration, and Hidden Threat

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Compliance
sub_scenes.description: A native man is captured, Sinister Grauer gives orders, leading to torture and forced compliance from Devil Dog to obtain sub detector plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Capture and Initial Search of the Native Man
Preparation for Torture and Forced Compliance
Cooperation and Information Exchange with Foreign Agent

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Loss, and Revenge
sub_scenes.description: Dolan confesses to arson, justifying his actions, leading to chaos, Sam's death, and Dolan's resolve for revenge against natives.

narrative_arcs.title: Sam's Sacrifice and Dolan's Vengeful Resolve

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Combat and Alliance with Natives
sub_scenes.description: Dolan engages natives in combat, defeats the chief, and surprisingly forms an alliance after the natives show homage.

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma and Dolan's Reward
sub_scenes.description: Captain Grauer faces a dilemma, Dolan is rewarded with shore leave and then disciplines another officer in a bizarre manner.

narrative_arcs.title: Shore Leave Reward and Service Spanking

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering a racketeering scheme and a desperate need for a blood transfusion.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Twinkle Twins and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and their backstory, followed by news editor assigning them the banker murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: Twins inquire at the police station, get a lead about Guy Reilly and a hospital, prompting them to investigate further at the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly's Illness

sub_scenes.title: Blood Type Mystery and Farnacci Connection
sub_scenes.description: At the hospital, twins learn about Miss Reilly's rare blood type and the need for Farnacci's blood, leading them to suspect Farnacci's involvement and contact their editor.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Inform Elijah and Phone Call

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and the Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Twins search for Tom Reilly, getting information from locals and Mrs. Murphy, only to be ambushed as they leave Mrs. Murphy's house.

narrative_arcs.title: Mrs. Murphy's Revelation and the Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Chase, and Community Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Twins escape the ambush, leading to a car escape, cab chase, intervention by the Irish neighborhood, and police arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Diane's Cab Chase and Irish Blockade
Irish Neighborhood Intervention and Police Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Hospital and Blood Transfusion Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Police depart, twins go to hospital, learn about Reilly's condition and blood transfusion need, community blood donation resolves crisis, leading to Lassie's recovery celebration.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hospital and Anxious Wait
Urgent Need for Blood Transfusion and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call and Community Response for Blood Donors
Demand for Justice and Police Involvement
Police Raid and Confrontation at the Poolroom
